name: Psychosocial Factors
description: Psychological, social, and behavioral factors influencing the condition

name: Source of Symptoms
description: The anatomical or physiological origin of the patient's symptoms

name: Pain Type/Mechanism
description: The underlying mechanism driving the pain experience

name: Pathology
description: Underlying tissue damage or disease processes

name: Impairments
description: Body structure and function limitations identified through assessment

name: Contributing Factors
description: Factors that may have contributed to the development or persistence of the condition

name: Contraindications/Precautions
description: Safety considerations and precautions for treatment planning

name: Management Priorities
description: Key priorities for treatment and management approach

name: Prognosis
description: Expected outcome and recovery timeline considerations

name: Activities & Participation
description: Impact on daily activities, work, and social participation
